TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中的文本框，用户可以在此输入文本。

span.span: Represents a text box in a that allows the user to enter text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是适合用来托管在。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 在公开的托管的控件的属性和事件子集级别，但基础控件是完全可通过访问属性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控件允许用户在应用程序中输入文本。The control allows the user to enter text in an application. 此控件具有标准 Windows 文本框控件，包括多行编辑中找不到的其他功能。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing. 通常情况下，控件用于显示单个文本行或接受它作为输入。Typically, a control is used to display a single line of text or accept it as input. 可以使用若要启用多行文本要显示或输入。You can use the to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 设置并属性设置为`true`若要允许多行中的更大文本操作控件。Set the and properties to `true` to allow greater text manipulation in a multiline control. 您可以限制到输入的文本量通过设置控件属性设置为特定数目的字符。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 使用属性，以允许用户键入仅大写字母、 仅小写字母或到大写和小写字符的组合控件。Use the property to allow the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 若要限制从输入中的文本控件，可以创建的事件处理程序事件，以验证在控件中输入每个字符。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 你也可以限制中的数据的所有条目通过设置控件属性设置为`true`。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了带有各种常用的属性设置，其中包括自动完成选项。The following code example demonstrates a with various common property settings, including automatic completion options. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行 控件中按 Enter 键时，是在控件中创建一行新文本还是激活窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果按 Enter 键时在多行版本的控件中创建一行新文本，则为 ；如果按 Enter 键时激活窗体的默认按钮，则为 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是`false`，用户必须按 CTRL + ENTER 在多行中创建一个新行控件。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果没有默认按钮窗体，ENTER 键将总是在控件中，无论此属性的值是什么创建一行新文本。If there is no default button for the form, then the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, no matter what the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放到此方法传递鼠标坐标。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在鼠标指针悬停在控件文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the mouse pointer hovers over a word in the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`lineNum`参数为负，返回 0。If the `lineNum` parameter is negative, returns 0. 如果`lineNum`参数超出了该控件中的行数返回控件中的最后一行的第一个字符索引。If the `lineNum` parameter exceeds the number of lines in the control, returns the first character index for the last line in the control. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行，而不是分配行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 显示的行数可能会超出分配由于自动换行的行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果将分配到两个较长的行控件，并设置并到`true`，两个已分配的长行产生四个物理 （或显示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`方法的参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值为零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果文本中的第一个逻辑行的一部分控件换行到下一行方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符具有换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一步，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法可搜索的文本，可以获取到找到搜索结果的位置的字符的索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法来确定单词的哪一行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数不在可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号是控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入点定位该控件的可见区域方法将会滚动控件的内容，直到在该控件的底部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入点位于控件的可见区域的上方，此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件顶部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 可以在多行文本框中使用此方法以确保当前文本入口点是该控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件不具有焦点，或者已在控件的可见区域中放置插入符号，则此方法无效。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性指示新的文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果此属性设置为控件中的文本的长度之外的位置时，将最后一个字符后放置选择开始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 文本框控件中选定文本后，更改此属性可能会降低的值属性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果所指示的位置之后控件中的剩余文本属性小于的值属性、 的值属性会自动减小。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值属性将永远不会导致在增加属性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式将插入符号在文本框内通过设置到要插入符号移动到和设置的文本框内的位置属性的值为零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 在文本框中必须具有顺序为插入符号移动焦点。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.
